betterquesting:10.desc:8:
You will need some hydrogen fluoride for use in making Hexafluorosilicic acid and molten Cryolite in order to process alumina into aluminum.

To make the Hydrogen Fluoride craft
1 Bronze Mixer
1 Bronze turbine and appropriate burning box and boiler
or diesel generator

You will need to pipe in your Sulfuric Acid and put in 3 fluorite dusts (any color dust will work).

Once running you will get 6 Calcium Sulfate Dust and 4 Hydrogen Fluoride fluid.  You will need to pipe the Hydrogen Fluoride to the next quest to continue the process.
§a§6
The recipe:
3 Fluorite Dusts (any color) + 7000L Sulfuric Acid => [Mixer 16/RU/t] => 6 Calcium Sulfate Dusts + 4000L Hydrogen Sulfide.
§a§f§6§a
To complete the quest collect in a drum:
1000L of Hydrogen Fluoride
§9§b
Note:  You cannot collect Hydrogen Fluoride with a bucket, you need to use a drum.  After collecting the Hydrogen Fluoride in a drum, you can place the drum on top of the next mixer to empty the fluid from the drum into the mixer for the next two quests.  You will need to use a Monkey Wrench on the drum to set it to fill adjacent storages.
